articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from across the ideological spectrum expressed deep skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump from the primary ballot under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: King Charles diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace announces
articles.description: The King has begun treatment for cancer discovered during his recent hospital procedure for benign prostate enlargement. He will postpone public duties but continue state business and paperwork.

articles.title: Boeing replaces head of 737 Max program after mid-air panel blowout
articles.description: Boeing has replaced Ed Clark, the head of its 737 Max program, following the Alaska Airlines incident where a door panel blew out mid-flight. Katie Ringgold will take over as vice president and general manager of the program.
